"His impromptu... his decision to take off and go without the hesitation is big," said Bears offensive coordinator Mike Martz of Jay Cutler . He makes plays with his feet. I haven't had a quarterback like that before. "He's made some really big plays for us. He's kept us in games and got us in position to score. Last week we had a couple plays for him in the game plan that we actually designed to run in the playoffs. Jay Cutler usually chooses not to protect himself by sliding feet first, but the Bears are more likely take a risk in the playoffs. "He's just such a gifted athlete with the ball

"( Allen Iverson ) will not be able to return to professional basketball for some six to eight weeks or more this season," Andrews said in a statement sent out by Allen Iverson 's manager, Gary Moore . At this point, it is certainly more important to get his calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain. We anticipate a full recovery and certainly anticipate him being able to resume a normal basketball career.
